ul.class: nav nav-tabs nav-justified nav-brand mt16 mb16 text-center

a.style: border: 1px solid #CED2DB; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none;
border: 1px solid #CED2DB; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none;
border: 1px solid #CED2DB; border-top-style: none; border-right-style: none; border-bottom-style: none;

div.t-att-class: 'tab-pane fade in %s col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12' %('active' if active_tab == '1' else '')
'tab-pane fade in active col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12' if brand_categories == product_categories[0] else 'tab-pane fade in col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12'
'tab-pane product_tab fade col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 active in' if b_c == brand_categs[0] else 'tab-pane product_tab fade col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12'

button.name: confirm
button.style: margin: auto; display: block; background-color: #9e9e9e; color: #fff; padding: 20px 40px; font-size: 2.3em;

div.t-att-class: 'tab-pane fade in %s col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12' %('active' if active_tab == '2' else '')

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 mt8 mb8 sort_products

div.t-att-class: 'hidden' if not partner.is_product_active(pp) else 'col-xs-3 col-sm-3 col-md-3 col-lg-3 pull-left product_minus'
div.t-att-style: 'background-color: {}; height: 100%; color: #fff;'.format('#FF4F35' if pp in partner.m_range_product_ids else '#FFCF35')

div.t-att-class: 'hidden' if partner.is_product_active(pp) else 'col-xs-3 col-sm-3 col-md-3 col-lg-3 pull-right product_plus'
'tab-pane fade in %s col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12' %('active' if active_tab == '3' else '')

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 mt16 mb32 text-center
col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 mt16 mb32 text-center
col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 mt16 mb32
col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 mt16 mb32 text-center

div.t-att-class: 'tab-pane fade in %s col-xs-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12' %('active' if active_tab == '4' else '')

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 mt32 mb32

a.class: btn btn-default btn-lg mt32 mb32 pull-left

button.class: btn btn-warning btn-lg mt32 mb32 pull-right
button.name: btn-save
